scripts.create:db:dev: export NODE_ENV=development& dotenv -e .env.local sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.create:db:dev:seed: export NODE_ENV=development& dotenv -e .env.local sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug
scripts.reset:db:dev: export NODE_ENV=development& sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.reset:db:dev:seed: export NODE_ENV=development& sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug
scripts.dev:start: npx pm2 --name backend start index.js --watch && npm run stack:start
scripts.dev:stop: npx pm2 stop all && pm2 del all && npm run stack:stop
